subjects.name: Signals and Systems
subjects.description: Continuous and discrete signals, Fourier transforms, Laplace transforms, Z-transforms

subjects.name: Analog Circuits
subjects.description: Operational amplifiers, filters, oscillators, voltage regulators, analog IC design

subjects.name: Digital Circuits
subjects.description: Logic gates, combinational circuits, sequential circuits, memory devices

subjects.name: Control Systems
subjects.description: Feedback systems, stability analysis, root locus, frequency response, PID controllers

subjects.name: Communication Systems
subjects.description: Amplitude modulation, frequency modulation, digital communication, error correction

subjects.name: Electromagnetics
subjects.description: Maxwell's equations, wave propagation, transmission lines, antennas

subjects.name: VLSI Design
subjects.description: CMOS technology, logic design, layout design, verification, testing

subjects.name: Digital Signal Processing
subjects.description: DFT, FFT, digital filters, filter design, DSP processors

subjects.name: Network Theory
subjects.description: Circuit analysis, network theorems, two-port networks, filters

subjects.name: Electronic Devices
subjects.description: Semiconductor physics, diodes, transistors, FETs, device modeling

subjects.name: Power Electronics
subjects.description: Power semiconductor devices, converters, inverters, motor drives
